about_the_game: The Windsor Pack includes ‘The Windsor’ Ironcast which uses a unique device to steal a layer of shield defences from its opponent, weakening them whilst improving its own defences. It also includes Commander Henry Brent who has a signature augmentation which rewards players who match long chains of nodes with a temporary shield boost. In addition, his Ironcast always begins the game with an active shield layer.
detailed_description: The Windsor Pack includes ‘The Windsor’ Ironcast which uses a unique device to steal a layer of shield defences from its opponent, weakening them whilst improving its own defences. It also includes Commander Henry Brent who has a signature augmentation which rewards players who match long chains of nodes with a temporary shield boost. In addition, his Ironcast always begins the game with an active shield layer.
legal_notice: Ironcast © 2015 Ripstone Ltd. Developed by Dreadbit Ltd. “Ironcast” is a trademark of Ripstone Ltd. All rights reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.2 LTS (32bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G630 @ 2.70 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon X850 XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.2 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.13 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9400M
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 "Yosemite"
  • Processor: Intel i7 (4980Q) @ 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M 2GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The Windsor Pack includes ‘The Windsor’ Ironcast which uses a unique device to steal a layer of shield defences from its opponent, weakening them whilst improving its own defences. It also includes a new Commander, Henry Brent.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
